channel.title: I need ham help

item.title: I need ham help
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

well to join or create a channle you can click on that triangle looking thing and when u click create or join it asks for name and password use the names and password for the server or use the name and pass you want for your channle also you can join servers by right clicking on the owners/hosters adress and click copy adress and in mopar press

file>new ip and then paste it in the box that pops up
